page.title: 14Trade
page.content: There is one Post Office and one shop in the area. As trade is poor the local shop closes each day at 1.00p.m Groceries are dearer than in town, and for economic reasons shoppers only buy goods from the shop that are urgently needed. The bulk of their food is bought elsewhere. The Post Office sells sweets and stationary, as well as paints, farm requisites,a limited ammount of wellingtons, shoes and tools. The Post Office runs a Taxi service, and also takes local handicapped children to and from school. There is also a garage on the Post Office site, which offers a car and implement repair service. Petrol is also sold.
